__e: I entreat you both that, being of so young days brought up with him and since so neighbored to his youth and humor that you vouchsafe your rest here in our court some little time, so by your companies to draw him into pleasures, and to gather so much as from occasion you may glean whether aught to us unknown afflicts him thus that, opened, lies within our remedy.
Yes, of course it's more convenient to watch from the comfort of your own home, but I didn't ask for your opinion.
I know that I'm the cog in the wheel that maybe makes beach day better for you... Yeah. But I don't think you're seeing anything from my point of view right now.
Then I met you, and I thought... how convenient it was that you should think that you had shot him.
Since I am innocent of this crime I find it decidedly inconvenient that the gun was never found.
How convenient for you that I can't.
He was treated as a combatant in that war. Until it no longer suited our government to treat him.
How convenient for you that I can't.
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. Oh, but they conveniently fuckin' missed, didn't they?
Right now, people like me are out there getting killed by people like you, conveniently timed with the arrival of your old acquaintance.
Right now, people like me are out there getting killed by people like you, conveniently timed with the arrival of your old acquaintance.
